warezcdn.name: World Destruction
warezcdn.title: Wârudo disutorakushon: Sekai bokumetsu no rokunin

imdb.title: Wârudo disutorakushon: Sekai bokumetsu no rokunin
imdb.plot: SEGA and FUNimation are joining forces to bring you a thrilling new anime based on the epic adventure RPG of the same name. Available exclusively on Nintendo DS. Morte is a lonely beauty with an axe to grind and a grudge against t...

episodes.title: Episode #1.1
episodes.plot: Morte, a member of the World Destruction Committee, dreams of putting the planet out of its misery, but before she can complete her mission, she must find a way to activate the Destruct Code.

episodes.title: Episode #1.2
episodes.plot: Morte, Toppy, and Kyrie find themselves trapped aboard a pleasure ship with a pair of World Salvation Committee operatives who will stop at nothing to obtain the Destruct Code.

episodes.title: Episode #1.3
episodes.plot: Imprisoned by Beastmen, Morte convinces Toppy to dig an escape tunnel. All goes according to plan until a run-in with a guard sets off alarms, forcing the WDC to fight for its freedom.

episodes.title: Episode #1.4
episodes.plot: The intrepid adventurers of the WDC get involved in a century-old romance after Kyrie damages a cursed Sakura Blossom Tree. Now, he and Toppy must risk their lives to give a ghostly lover hope.

episodes.title: Episode #1.5
episodes.plot: Morte and Kyrie are captured and forced to fight for their lives in the coliseum. The WDC's furriest member mounts a rescue attempt, but it's foiled by a face from his past.

episodes.title: Episode #1.6
episodes.plot: Summer Continent's brutal heat forces the WDC to seek refuge at a remote hospital run by a mysterious Beastman. Kyrie and Toppy are happy to rest, but Morte is suspicious of the doctor's motives.

episodes.title: Episode #1.7
episodes.plot: As part of a secret organization planning to destroy the world, it's hard for Toppy's reputation to get any worse, but freeloaders masquerading as the WDC is more than the little bear can stomach.

episodes.title: Episode #1.8
episodes.plot: An explosion in a Sandmarine forces the WDC and the WSC to either join forces or risk dying at the bottom of the Sand-sea. Can they stop fighting long enough to save their own lives?

episodes.title: Episode #1.9
episodes.plot: The WDC stops to rest in a town where Beastmen and humans coexist peacefully. While there, Morte follows a boy who reminds her of her brother, and Kyrie searches for answers about the Destruct Code.

episodes.title: Episode #1.10
episodes.plot: Morte, Kyrie, and Toppy journey to Clock Town in the hopes that Alligator Master can unravel the mystery of the Destruct Code for them.

episodes.title: Episode #1.11
episodes.plot: On the frigid wasteland of Winter Continent, Morte battles Lia, a dragon assassin for the WSC. Their brutal confrontation provides the Alligator Master with a chance to seize the Destruct Code.

episodes.title: Episode #1.12
episodes.plot: The World Destruction Committee takes shelter in a mysterious cave where memories come to life. The past can be comforting, but it will it lull Morte to her death?

episodes.title: Episode #1.13
episodes.plot: The WDC and the Eagle Master battle for possession of the Destruct Code, but only the Alligator Master knows the secret of the weapon that could destroy the world.
